attributes.action: Stop making working families poor by confiscating their earning and then making them apply for state handouts to get their own money back!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We call on the government to stop the wasteful & demeaning practise of taxing low income working families into poverty, then forcing them to claim back their own money in the form of various benefits.
This disgraceful system robs the low paid of their hard earned money and much worse - their dignity and self respect.
Too add further insult - their tax is also used to pay for the administation of this grotesque injustice!
